CHAT.comment: UNITED STATES, Petitioner v. AHMED RESSAM.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:25 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GEN. MICHAEL B. MUKASEY ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THOMAS W. HILLIER, II ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF GEN. MICHAEL B. MUKASEY ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:01 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
